articles.description: In his new memoir Felton, 35, who played antagonist Draco Malfoy, says he came to understand that the actress was a 'kindred spirit' and says they have formed a lifelong bond after meeting on set.
articles.content:
Harry Potter star Tom Felton has spoken of his 'secret love' for Emma Watson, saying what started as an on-set friendship deepened into something more significant.
In his new memoir Felton, 35, who … [+3317 chars]
